name: Lauruss Infotech
overview:
Lauruss Infotech provides application solutions for all platform like iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Windows and Symbain mobile application development including special grade Web Solutions and Brand design.

Lauruss Infotech has been providing second to none web solutions since three years and get an edge over the competition. Lauruss Infotech provides offshore mobile application development and web application development services that enable our clients to enjoy incredible benefits of mobility. We have an expertise in developing mobile application across a wide range of platforms.

We have delivered over 1000 mobile application and web development projects successfully. As a result of continuous improvement and high-quality, we have many reputed names as our partner across the globe especially renowned firms in London and New York. We have a long list of satisfied clients belong to different corners of the world such as UK, US, Canada, Australia, Asia Pacific, UAE.

Our wide array of mobile application development services includes iPhone application development, android application development, blackberry application development, and windows application development. At Lauruss Infotech, you will get affordable outsourcing of custom mobile application development, game application development and web development that deliver absolute satisfaction and complete ROI.

Armed with the team of experienced mobile and website developers, Lauruss Infotech works closely with customers to ensure complete understanding of your business objectives. We follow complete software-development cycle starting from system analysis and architecture, web development and implementation, testing, hosting and maintenance of the software.
